talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, you brought the orb.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>So you agree that it contains one of the
heroines' spirits, right?
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That...is not the orb I found.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm impressed that you tracked down
another orb already!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Since you brought it here, I take it you
agree with me that the orbs contain the
spirits of the heroines.
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Huh? Link? You knew this was my house?<sp:5:1:0>
Well, I shouldn't be surprised that such an
expert investigator found me.<sp:0:4:0>I'm in the middle of writing up my report
about the eighth hero.<sp:0:4:0>I've got all my old documents and field
notes from previous expeditions to go off
of, to be extra thorough.<sp:0:4:0>This will be a history text they'll teach for
ages to come.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>And it's co-authored by Rotana and Link!
You and I will soon be the stars of the
archaeological society!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Incredible... <sp:5:0:0>It fits perfectly!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I had a feeling, based on the shape, that
placing the orb there was the right thing
to do.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But placing one doesn't seem to have
had much effect. <sp:5:0:0>Hmmm...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Maybe once we return orbs to <clr:0000>all seven of
the heroines<clr:ffff>, we'll see something.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>We might even finally meet the <clr:0000>eighth<clr:ffff>
of them!<sp:0:4:0>This could turn out to be the biggest
discovery in Gerudo history!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But I don't know how we're meant to
return the orbs to the statues in the
first place.<sp:0:4:0>Even if we had it narrowed down to the
Gerudo region, the orbs are small enough
to fit anywhere. <sp:5:0:0>Where would we start?
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>This is nearly impossible to solve on
my own. <sp:5:1:0>If only I could ask <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>
for a <clr:0000>prophecy<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But she's out with Lady Riju right now.<sp:0:4:0>Besides, even if I knew where the orbs
belonged, I couldn't get there with the
<clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff> in my way.
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That was the last orb. <sp:5:0:0>Wasn't it?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>This is so exciting! We've returned the
spirits to all seven of the heroines!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But I don't know how we're expected
to return the orbs to the statues in the
first place.<sp:0:4:0>Even if we had it narrowed down to the
Gerudo region, the orbs are small enough
to fit anywhere. <sp:5:0:0>Where would we start?
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>This is nearly impossible to solve on
my own. <sp:5:1:0>Maybe I should ask <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>
for a <clr:0000>prophecy<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>She should be in the <clr:0000>palace courtyard<clr:ffff>,
I think.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>This has to be the place mentioned on
the <clr:0000>six stelae<clr:ffff> where the spirits want to
be placed.<sp:0:4:0>Now we just need to figure out <clr:0000>which
orb goes with which statue<clr:ffff>...
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>I'm sorry. In all the excitement, I almost
forgot my manners.<sp:0:4:0>We wouldn't have found this hidden room
without you. <sp:5:0:0>So you should go in first.
talk0014:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0300><clr:ffff><snd:Think>It would be nice if <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff> had a <clr:0000>prophecy<clr:ffff>
for us. But she's out with <clr:0000>Lady Riju<clr:ffff> right
now, so no such luck.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Besides, even if I knew where to get the
orbs, I wouldn't want to risk going outside
into that <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I'm not sure what progress I can make
right now...
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>As I thought, this seems to be the place
to return the spirits described on the
<clr:0000>six stelae<clr:ffff>.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm eager to investigate such a huge
discovery right away, of course, but you
were the one who found the hidden room.<sp:0:4:0>So it's fine if you want to go in first.
I-I'll be in right after you.
talk0001:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>A good place to start would be searching for other
<clr:0000>orbs <clr:ffff>like that one.<sp:0:4:0>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0>maybe it's time to go to <clr:0000>Patricia for a
prophecy<clr:ffff>. She should be in the <clr:0000>palace courtyard<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0090:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't be certain, but...the <clr:0000>stone stelae<clr:ffff>
did seem to have similar drawings
on them.<sp:0:4:0>I sincerely believe that the <clr:0000>orbs <clr:ffff>you
brought must have been some of the
seven heroines' spirits.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Every inscription on the stelae starts with,
"the seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo." After that, it goes...
"Their secret will be expressed on
six monuments.<sp:0:4:0>"An eighth channels and guides the
powers of these seven.<sp:0:4:0>"The powers of the seven are heart,
skill, fortitude, wisdom, flight, mobility,
and compassion.<sp:0:4:0>"Their power is housed within the
seven spirits.<sp:0:4:0>"Their spirits rest within the land of
the Gerudo.<sp:0:4:0>"When their powers return to them,
the shrouded eighth will be known."
That's all six of the inscriptions.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>So to sum it all up...<sp:0:4:0>The eighth directs the powers of the
seven—<sp:5:0:0>heart, skill, fortitude, wisdom,
flight, mobility, and compassion.<sp:0:4:0>To meet this eighth, we have to return
the seven heroines' spirits to them.<sp:0:4:0>And those <clr:0000>spirits<clr:ffff> are each hidden within
the Gerudo region.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Does that help?
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They're some <clr:0000>large ruins <clr:ffff>located just
<clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> of Gerudo Town.<sp:0:4:0>Beneath them is a place called the
<clr:0000>Gerudo Sanctuary<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've been there often in my research.
Once, I found an entrance leading below
ground on the north side, but...<sp:0:4:0>At the time, I couldn't figure out how to
get inside.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I think I'll return to the <clr:0000>site of the statues
of the seven heroines<clr:ffff> to take a last look.<sp:0:4:0>If you're interested, why not come along?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't be completely certain, but I believe
I saw similar images depicted on the
<clr:0000>stone stelae<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I think that <clr:0000>orb <clr:ffff>that I gave you must be
one of the seven heroines' spirits.
talk0007: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, are you here to investigate too?
talk0081:
If we're right, then something interesting
should happen when we <clr:0000>return the orb<clr:ffff> to
a <clr:0000>heroine statue<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Could I ask you to try placing the orb <clr:0000>in
a statue's hands<clr:ffff>?
talk0009:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>A good place to start would be searching for
similar <clr:0000>orbs<clr:ffff>.

Hmm...<sp:5:0:0>maybe it's time to go to <clr:0000>Patricia for a
prophecy<clr:ffff>. She should be in the <clr:0000>palace courtyard<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0082:
If we're right, then something interesting
should happen if we <clr:0000>return the orb<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>a
heroine statue<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Could I ask you to place the orb <clr:0000>in a
statue's hands<clr:ffff>?
talk0083:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>A good place to start would be searching for other
<clr:0000>orbs <clr:ffff>like that one.<sp:0:4:0>One of <clr:0000>Patricia's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>prophecies<clr:ffff> might be what I need
here, but she's out with <clr:0000>Lady Riju<clr:ffff> right now.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:ffff>And even if I did know where to find the orbs,
I couldn't go get them as long as the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>
is in the way. What in the world can we do?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0084:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>A good place to start would be searching for other
<clr:0000>orbs <clr:ffff>like that one.

One of <clr:0000>Patricia's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>prophecies<clr:ffff> might be what I need
here, but she's out with <clr:0000>Lady Riju<clr:ffff> right now.

<snd:Think>And even if I did know where to find the orbs,
I couldn't go get them as long as the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>
is in the way. What in the world can we do?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>did you come here to do your
own research?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I see that the orb I gave you earlier is
here now.<sp:5:0:0>
talk0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I knew there was a reason the chief
approved of you!<sp:0:4:0>If you find another orb, I'd love it if you
carry it back here for me again.
talk0086:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Which means you must have carried it
here for me!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Nice work.<sp:5:0:0> Voe have their uses, eh?
talk0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see... <sp:5:0:0>We've got seven of them
here now.<sp:0:4:0>And there are seven statues. So if we
return all the orbs to the statues,
something should happen!<sp:0:4:0>While you're here, <sp:5:0:0>could I ask you to put
the orbs in the statues' hands?
talk0087:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And that's not the only orb you brought,
I see. <sp:5:0:0>This is a big help!
talk0072:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Voe do have their uses, don't they?<sp:0:4:0>If you find any more orbs, I'd be thrilled
if you bring them here to me!
talk0088:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right. <sp:5:0:0>This is all seven of the orbs.
Which means we've restored all seven
heroines' spirits.<sp:5:0:0>
talk0073:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> You brought me another orb? Sarqso.<sp:0:4:0>Lugging that thing all the way here must
have been tough. You deserve something
for working so hard.
talk0074:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> did you come for a firsthand look?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>If so, you've got great timing! <sp:5:0:0>I just
discovered something here.
talk0089:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We did it!<sp:5:0:0> If we're correct, then something
should happen right...about...now.
talk0075:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?! <sp:5:0:0>You were already searching for
the orbs?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Look at you! <sp:5:0:0>Who knew voe could be
so reliable?
talk0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Next time you see me, I'll be the star of
the archaeological society!<sp:0:4:0>Well then, sav'orq.
talk0076:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Sarqso. <sp:5:0:0>That must've been hard, huh?<sp:5:0:0>
Here, let me reward you.
talk0061:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. Their secret will be expressed
on six stelae.<sp:0:4:0>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. An eighth channels and guides
the powers of these seven.<sp:0:4:0>"The seven heroines protect the Gerudo
with the powers of heart, skill, fortitude,
wisdom, flight, mobility, and compassion.<sp:0:4:0>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. Their power is housed within
the seven spirits.<sp:0:4:0>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. Their spirits rest within the
land of the Gerudo.<sp:0:4:0>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. When their powers return to
them, the shrouded eighth will be known."<sp:0:4:0>These six stelae set us on our journey to
learn the truth...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Hee-hee. <sp:5:0:0>Not a bad way to begin a
report, wouldn't you say?
talk0077:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you brought an orb here, you must also
believe they house the heroines' spirits.<sp:0:4:0>If we're right, then something should
happen once we <clr:0000>return an orb <clr:ffff>to <clr:0000>a
heroine statue<clr:ffff>.
Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>Could I ask you to try placing an
orb <clr:0000>in a statue's hands<clr:ffff>?
talk0062:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>What I found deep within the place we call
our sanctuary was a treasure meant for
the eighth hero, along with a final stela.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>This part's a bit long, but bear with me,
and I'll zip right through it, OK?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>"Long ago, a monstrosity of the sands
attacked Gerudo Town. Its war cry rang
out over the dunes like a raging demon.<sp:0:4:0>"We seven heroines of the Gerudo—the
most stalwart, chosen vai—surged forth
to engage it.<sp:0:4:0>"Yet this monstrosity tossed us about like
the tumbling weeds. We feared that the
proud Gerudo would be extinguished.<sp:0:4:0>"And then...a hero appeared from afar.
He marshaled the seven heroines,
counseling us to combine our strengths.<sp:0:4:0>"With strength upon strength, we seven
routed the monstrosity. We named our
benefactor, 'the guiding light of Gerudo.'<sp:0:4:0>"Yet though we had naught but the
highest praise for him, he was refused
entry into Gerudo Town.<sp:0:4:0>"'Twas Gerudo law that all those like him
were barred.<sp:0:4:0>"How hollow our gratitude and praise
must have rung in this hero's ears!<sp:0:4:0>"Thus was the link between his people
and the Gerudo severed.<sp:0:4:0>"Though we never bequeathed it to him,
the gift into which our feelings are bound
is enshrined at this sanctuary."<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>Phew, that's all of it. I didn't get any of
that wrong, did I?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Anyway, that's the big moment of the
third volume.
talk0078:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So...<sp:5:0:0>you already tried placing an orb on
a heroine statue?<sp:0:4:0>But according to you, nothing happened.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>The shape has me convinced that they
belong in the statues' arms.<sp:0:4:0>Guess we'll have to return the orbs to <clr:0000>all
seven of the heroines<clr:ffff> before we'll know.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>But this means we're one step closer to
the truth about our <clr:0000>mysterious eighth<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>We could be on the verge of the biggest
discovery in Gerudo history!
talk0063:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>"Your choice"?! <sp:5:1:0>You've got a co-author
credit on these! You could at least
pretend to show some interest!
talk0079:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That orb you found is a new one, isn't it?<sp:5:0:0>
This is a big breakthrough!
talk0064:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso for listening!<sp:0:4:0>Once this is complete, we'll be the toast
of the archaeological society!<sp:0:4:0>Hee-hee. I'd better bear down and get
it done as soon as I can!
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The giant orb is the key to the
North Gerudo Ruins sanctuary...<sp:0:4:0>You know...between the six stone stelae
in the shelter and this hidden room,
someone worked hard to hide the eighth.<sp:0:4:0>Just what was the big deal?
talk0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh?<sp:0:4:0>I thought I'd give you a diamond as your
reward, but it won't fit in your pouch.<sp:0:4:0>You did too much work to come away
with nothing though. What if you made
some room for this and came back later?
talk0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Have you made some room in your pack?<sp:5:0:0>
In that case, consider this yours!
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>My research report has expanded into
a grand trilogy.<sp:0:4:0>Do you want to hear some excerpts?<sp:5:0:0>
What am I saying. Of course you do.<sp:0:4:0>Which volume do you want to hear about?
talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good idea. Going back to square one is
sometimes the only way to get anywhere.
talk0067:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Listen, I went all-out and splurged on
a diamond as thanks for helping with
my research.<sp:0:4:0>The least you can do is meet me halfway
and make some room for it!<sp:0:4:0>Come speak to me again once you've
made some room in your belongings for,
I remind you, an extremely valuable gem.
talk0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't be certain, but...the <clr:0000>stone stelae<clr:ffff>
did seem to have similar drawings
on them.<sp:0:4:0>I sincerely believe that the <clr:0000>orb <clr:ffff>you
brought must have been one of the
seven heroines' spirits.
talk0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm going to entrust the task to you!<sp:0:4:0>You only have to <clr:0000>carry <clr:ffff>it a little ways, up
to the <clr:0000>North Gerudo Ruins<clr:ffff>. It should be
no trouble for you!<sp:0:4:0>Do this much for me, and I'll consider
you a full research partner.<sp:0:4:0>The truth about our mystery eighth will be
something you and I uncover together!
talk0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> You brought me another orb? Sarqso.<sp:0:4:0>You deserve something for the trouble
you went to carrying it all the way here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Will this do?
talk0054: <sp:3:0:2:0701>This is why I rely on you.
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There might be nothing for it but to meet
with <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>—Lady Riju's pet sand seal—
and hope her <clr:0000>prophecies <clr:ffff>steer me right.<sp:0:4:0>She should be in the <clr:0000>palace courtyard<clr:ffff>.
Patricia, I mean. Not Lady Riju.
talk0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>What? <sp:5:0:0>You found your way into
the sanctuary?!<sp:0:4:0>So that giant orb was the key after all.<sp:5:1:0>
Well? <sp:5:0:0>Did you learn anything about our
mystery eighth?
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Something is supposed to happen when
a heroine's spirit is returned to its statue.<sp:0:4:0>Hey, why don't you try putting an orb <clr:0000>in
a statue's hands<clr:ffff>?
talk0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Once we returned the spirits to all seven
heroines,<sp:5:0:0> the ground shook, and a hidden
room appeared.<sp:0:4:0>"Our hearts are full with gratitude and
praise for the one who saw in us all that
we could be.<sp:0:4:0>"We have enshrined an appropriate gift in
the sanctuary at North Gerudo Ruins.<sp:0:4:0>"The outsized orb near the eighth statue
shall be the key that opens the way."<sp:0:4:0>Tucked away in that room was a key that
would guide us to a long-hidden truth.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Nice, eh? <sp:5:0:0>That's how the second volume
kicks off!
talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If what's written on those six stone stelae
is true, then this is a good sign.<sp:0:4:0>Once we return the orbs to <clr:0000>all seven
heroine statues<clr:ffff>, we should be on the
right track to learning about the <clr:0000>eighth<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Based on their shape, I have no doubt
that the orbs need to be placed on the
stone statues here.
talk0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>What? <sp:5:1:0>The eighth was a voe?<sp:5:1:0>
Is that true?!<sp:0:4:0>Sa'oten... <sp:5:1:0>If you asked me what I thought
the truth would turn out to be, I'd never
have guessed THIS.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>To say that what we learned here will
upend what we know of Gerudo history
is an understatement.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I've got to write up these findings as soon
as I can! <sp:5:1:0>Don't worry, I'll mention your
contributions as well!<sp:0:4:0>Uh...<sp:5:1:0>hang on.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>What name should I credit you as?
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, you're back again. <sp:5:0:0>You really mean
to see this through, don't you?
talk0059:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Link, eh? That's a funny coincidence.<sp:0:4:0>Must be nice, having the same name as
Princess Zelda's favored swordsman.<sp:0:4:0>I'll write this report up nice and thorough.
I know you're excited to read it!<sp:0:4:0>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Before I forget, this is your reward!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Huh?<sp:0:4:0>I can't help but notice that...<sp:5:1:0>nothing
is happening...<sp:5:1:0>
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey! I know I told you to go in first...<sp:0:4:0>But give me a chance to have a proper
look around before you go messing with
anything in there.<sp:0:4:0>There's something that looks like a <clr:0000>stone
stela<clr:ffff> in the back. That seems like a good
place for us to start.
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. I'm still certain that the orbs are
their spirits, and that we need to return
them to the heroine statues.<sp:0:4:0>That means there's something else we
haven't figured out. <sp:5:1:0>Could the <clr:0000>patterns<clr:ffff>
on the orbs have anything to do with it?
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>It should be fine to come inside now,
right? <sp:5:1:0>I want to get a better look at that
stone stela!
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm... <sp:5:1:0>I see.<sp:0:4:0>The North Gerudo Ruins sanctuary...<sp:5:1:0>
It says the giant orb is the key?
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Hey...does the ground feel to you like
it's shaking?!
talk0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Except... <sp:5:1:0>I'd have to carry that thing.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>And I got into archaeology to look at
things, not carry them.<sp:5:1:0>
talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They're <clr:0000>some large ruins <clr:ffff>located just
<clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> of Gerudo Town.<sp:0:4:0>Beneath them is a place called the
<clr:0000>Gerudo Sanctuary<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've been there often in my research.
Once, I found an entrance leading below
ground on the north side, but...<sp:0:4:0>At the time, I couldn't figure out how to
get inside. <sp:5:1:0>Now though...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>I think this large orb might be the key
that opens the way beneath!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>And...<sp:5:1:0>if I'm right...<sp:0:4:0>The truth about the mysterious eighth,
which no one has ever learned before,
will finally come to light!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm still certain that the orbs are their
spirits, and that we need to return them
to the heroine statues.<sp:0:4:0>That means there's something else we
haven't figured out. <sp:5:1:0>Could the <clr:0000>patterns<clr:ffff>
on the orbs have anything to do with it?
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That orb was the last one, right? Now all
seven heroines have their spirits back!<sp:0:4:0>Brace yourself—we have no idea what
might happen next!
